attributes.action: How can you possibly urge the Iranian Prime Minister to listen to his people when you yourself persistently refuse to listen to the people of UK?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. If you wish to write to the PM instead, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
